name: Steve Brazier

blurbs.general: I'm a Stockholm (previously London) based Software Developer who has worked with a number of languages (including Python, PHP, JavaScript/TypeScript, C#, Elixir/Erlang) and environments.
blurbs.python: I've spent the last few years working with Python. I've worked with Python on aws lambda, converted large projects from Python 2 to 3 and setup new projects in async typed Python.

things_i_love: Mashing typing and static analysis onto dynamically typed languages
Avoiding writing code in the first place
